module.name: Twitter
module.author: Core

property.title: Search Term
property.helpText: Search term. You can test your search term in the twitter.com search box first.

property.title: Language
property.helpText: Language in which tweets should be returned

property.title: Count
property.helpText: The number of Tweets to return (default = 15).

property.title: Type
property.helpText: Recent shows only the most recent tweets, Popular the most popular and Mixed includes both popular and recent results.

property.title: Date Format
property.helpText: The format to apply to all dates returned by the Widget.

property.title: Distance
property.helpText: Distance in miles that the tweets should be returned from. Set to 0 for no restrictions.

property.title: Remove Mentions?
property.helpText: Should mentions (@someone) be removed from the Tweet Text?

property.title: Remove Hashtags?
property.helpText: Should Hashtags (#something) be removed from the Tweet Text?

property.title: Remove URLs?
property.helpText: Should URLs be removed from the Tweet Text? Most URLs do not compliment digital signage.
